name: py312-slim (WSL minimal + Jupyter)
postCreateCommand: set -eux; apt-get update && apt-get install -y --no-install-recommends git libgl1 libglib2.0-0 openssh-client && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*; git config --global user.name "$GIT_USER_NAME"; git config --global user.email "$GIT_USER_EMAIL"; git config --global init.defaultBranch main; python -m pip install --upgrade pip; if [ -f /workspace/requirements.txt ]; then pip install -r /workspace/requirements.txt; fi; python -m ipykernel install --user --name=devcontainer-py312 --display-name='Python (devcontainer)';
